tool_description:
Explore With 113 Translations In 44 Languages And 9 Recitations Free, Coming soon all languages
A RESTful Quran API to retrieve an Ayah, Surah, Juz or the enitre Holy Quran.
title: Al-Qur'an (All Translations)

api_list.name: Meta - Get the Meta data about Surah, Pages, Hibz and Juz
api_list.description: Returns all the meta data about the Qur'an available in this API
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://al-qur-an-all-translations.p.rapidapi.com/v1/meta"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "al-qur-an-all-translations.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Manzil - Get a Manzil of the Quran
api_list.description:
The Quran has 7 Manzils (for those who want to read / recite it over one week). You can get the text for each Manzil using the endpoint below.

Returns the requested manzil from a particular edition
{{edition}} is an edition identifier. Example: en.asad for Muhammad Asad's english translation
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://al-qur-an-all-translations.p.rapidapi.com/v1/manzil/{manzil}/{edition}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "al-qur-an-all-translations.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Ruku - Get a Ruku of the Quran
api_list.description:
The Quran has 556 Rukus. You can get the text for each Ruku using the endpoint below.

Returns the requested ruku from a particular edition
{{edition}} is an edition identifier. Example: en.asad for Muhammad Asad's english translation
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://al-qur-an-all-translations.p.rapidapi.com/v1/ruku/{ruku}/{edition}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "al-qur-an-all-translations.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Page - Get a page of the Quran
api_list.description:
Returns the requested page from a particular edition
{{edition}} is an edition identifier. Example: en.asad for Muhammad Asad's english translation
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://al-qur-an-all-translations.p.rapidapi.com/v1/page/{page}/{edition}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "al-qur-an-all-translations.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Hizb Quarter
api_list.description:
The Quran comprises 240 Hizb Quarters. One Hizb is half a Juz.

Returns the requested Hizb Quarter from a particular edition
{{edition}} is an edition identifier. Example: en.asad for Muhammad Asad's english translation
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://al-qur-an-all-translations.p.rapidapi.com/v1/hizbQuarter/{hizb}/{edition}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "al-qur-an-all-translations.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Sajda - Get all verses requiring Sajda
api_list.description:
Depending on the madhab, there can be 14, 15 or 16 sajdas. This API has 15.
Returns all the sajda ayahs from a particular edition
{{edition}} is an edition identifier. Example: en.asad for Muhammad Asad's english translation
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://al-qur-an-all-translations.p.rapidapi.com/v1/sajda/{edition}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "al-qur-an-all-translations.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Ayah - Get an Ayah of the Quran
api_list.description:
The Quran contains 6236 verses. With this endpoint, you can retrieve any of those verses.

Returns an ayah for a given edition.
{{reference}} here can be the ayah number or the surah:ayah. For instance, 262 or 2:255 will both get you Ayat Al Kursi
{{edition}} is an edition identifier. Example: en.asad for Muhammad Asad's english translation
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://al-qur-an-all-translations.p.rapidapi.com/v1/ayah/{reference}/{edition}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "al-qur-an-all-translations.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Juz - Get a Juz of the Quran
api_list.description:
Returns the requested juz from a particular edition
{{edition}} is an edition identifier. Example: en.asad for Muhammad Asad's english translation

Optional Parameters:
offset - Offset ayahs in a juz by the given number
limit - This is the number of ayahs that the response will be limited to.

api_list.name: Quran- Get a complete Quran edition
api_list.description:
Returns a complete Quran edition in the audio or text format
{{edition}} is an edition identifier. Example: en.asad for Muhammad Asad's english translation
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://al-qur-an-all-translations.p.rapidapi.com/v1/quran/{edition}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "al-qur-an-all-translations.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: List edition for given format
api_list.description:
Lists all editions for a given format
{{format}} can be 'audio' or 'text'
api_list.code:

url = "https://al-qur-an-all-translations.p.rapidapi.com/v1/edition/format/{format}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "al-qur-an-all-translations.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: List editions for language
api_list.description:
Lists all editions for a given language
{{language}} is a 2 digit language code. Example: en for English, fr for French, ar for Arabic
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://al-qur-an-all-translations.p.rapidapi.com/v1/edition/language/{language}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "al-qur-an-all-translations.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Languages
api_list.description: Lists all languages in which editions are available
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://al-qur-an-all-translations.p.rapidapi.com/v1/edition/language"

    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "al-qur-an-all-translations.p.rapidapi.com"

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Lists all available editions.
api_list.description:
You can filter the results using the parameters below.
Parameters
- format.... Specify a format. 'text' or 'audio
- language.... A 2 digit language code. Example: 'en', 'fr', etc.
- type... A valid type. Example - 'versebyverse', 'translation' etc.

api_list.name: Get Surah
api_list.description:
give digits in URL from 1 to 114 and get surah with different translations for now we are giving only two languages,
but we are working on adding more soon.
![](https://go4quiz.com/wp-content/uploads/List-of-114-Surahs-go4quiz.jpg)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://al-qur-an-all-translations.p.rapidapi.com/v1/surah/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "al-qur-an-all-translations.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
